channel.title: Need client help asap
channel.description:
ive downloaded over 10 clients none of which seemed to work so then i thought hmm mabye its not the client maybe its me. whenever i hit run on the client it says Java is not recognized as an internal or external command, or batch file.
my friend told me that i needed to set my classpath with java jdk but he wont tell me how.
so if someone can post a link so i can get java jdk and can tell me how to set my class path that would be great
thanks =]

item.title: Need client help asap
item.dc:creator: @pk_man_owned pk_man_owned
item.description:
@pk_man_owned wrote:

ive downloaded over 10 clients none of which seemed to work so then i thought hmm mabye its not the client maybe its me. whenever i hit run on the client it says Java is not recognized as an internal or external command, or batch file.

my friend told me that i needed to set my classpath with java jdk but he wont tell me how.

so if someone can post a link so i can get java jdk and can tell me how to set my class path that would be great

thanks =]

ok just go here

http://java.sun.com/products/archive/j2se/6u6/index.html

its the download link for java 6u6 trust me it WILL WORK!

Read full topic

item.description:

2nd one down in the list is the one you need
